channel.title: Multi-Agent on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-Agent on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: vscode: Your Home for Multi-Agent Development
item.description:
VS Code adds a unified interface to manage multiple coding agents (local, background, and cloud) from one place. It supports using third-party agents like Claude and Codex alongside Copilot and emphasizes interoperability via MCP and Agent Skills.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Multi-agent workflows in Foundry Agent Service
item.description:
Azure’s Foundry Agent Service now offers multi-agent workflows in public preview, letting developers create orchestrated, modular multi-agent processes via a visual designer or a code-first API. The feature supports context sharing, persistent state, and error recovery to handle complex enterprise scenarios.

  • Source: Azure Updates
